item.title: African Cloth
item.description:
I am just trying to see what kind of descriptions exist in popular press and in the Academic literature about the language terms and usage related to african cloth. I have had several cloth outfits created. I would like to record the names and uses of cloth related to how it is created, sold, taylored, and worn in Nigeria.

Links

  • https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/African_textiles
  • https://edition.cnn.com/style/article/african-textiles-dutch-future/index.html
  • https://blog.stylishgwinafrica.com/african-traditional-styles-couples/
  • Fill
  • Scroll
